short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert selected text to any currency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With inCurrency, you can seamlessly convert any currency on any website. 

Simply select, click and convert.

No more opening up a new tab, searching, or using your phone to convert currencies.

inCurrency is perfect for online shopping, travel planning, or comparing prices. 

Instantly understand the prices in another part of the world! 

Features: 
- Convert from hundreds of different currencies 
- Support for Cryptocurrencies
- One-click functionality
- Completely free with no ads
- Easy setup, get started in seconds

Usage:
- After installation, click the inCurrency icon to select the currencies you want to covert to/from. 
- Click "Save" to save your currency selections
- Highlight a price on any website and click the inCurrency icon
- The converted amount is shown instantly in the extension's popup
